channel.title: Makeing my own isle wiv paradise isle help please
channel.description:
right guys i need some help :cool:
i need to no how to make my own shops im not shure on them i need to no how to make my own banks booths ect i need to no how to make a dummy train str i need to no how to add a object into my island
thanks alot [br][size=1]Posted on: April 23, 2007, 07:06:23 AM[/size][hr]eny 1

item.title: Makeing my own isle wiv paradise isle help please
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

Okay, for
shops:
Go to shops.cfg, copy 1 line - edit the shop number into the next in the sequence and add your items.
own bank booths:
Okay well I dont have a source on this computer, but you need to add a global object in your public voids. Adding; which way they face, their ItemID’s and co-ords.
dummy train str:
Search for case 823 and edit where it says 0, (under it) to 2
adding object:
see “own bank booths”

Read full topic
